=== probschem bday (260) query 

first float is time in seconds, second is max belief returned

(0 (1.0000000000005116e-2 1))
(1 (2.125 1366/1369))
(2 (4.116 11183/11231))

=== prob bday (260) query

second float is poly bound, last float is time, middle two are max
belief returned

ex/pol_bday.prob 1 1/1 1.000000 1.6097469329834
ex/pol_bday.prob 2 1/259 0.003861 1.56898880004883
ex/pol_bday.prob 3 1/259 0.003861 2.15753698348999
ex/pol_bday.prob 4 1/259 0.003861 2.17529296875
ex/pol_bday.prob 5 1/259 0.003861 2.25836205482483
ex/pol_bday.prob 6 1/259 0.003861 2.32771992683411
ex/pol_bday.prob 7 1/259 0.003861 2.29600405693054
ex/pol_bday.prob 8 1/259 0.003861 2.32072186470032
ex/pol_bday.prob 9 1/259 0.003861 2.32135796546936
ex/pol_bday.prob 10 1/259 0.003861 2.29052305221558
ex/pol_bday.prob 0 1/259 0.003861 2.53695392608643


=== larger bday space ===

(define (make-secret-belief-bday-large)
  (list (uniform 0 364) 
	(uniform 1910 2010)))

=== probschem on large bday (260) query

(0 (.01099999999999568 1))
(1 (2.164999999999992 35654/35681))
(2 (4.1510000000000105 34543/34591))
(4 (8.25 32321/32411))
(8 (16.329999999999984 4663/4692))
(16 (32.441 10252/10409))
(32 (64.91 3940/4569))
64: (Aborting!: maximum recursion depth exceeded)

=== prob on large bday (260) query

ex/pol_bday_large.prob 1 1/1 1.000000 1.60347890853882
ex/pol_bday_large.prob 2 1/707 0.001414 1.56583905220032
ex/pol_bday_large.prob 3 1/707 0.001414 2.11771512031555
ex/pol_bday_large.prob 4 1/707 0.001414 2.12742209434509
ex/pol_bday_large.prob 0 1/707 0.001414 2.20078206062317

=== bday queries in sequence prob ===

belief:
        uniform s_bday 0 364;
        uniform s_byear 1956 1992;

policy:
        max_prob_output [s_bday s_byear] 0.05
        max_prob_output [s_bday] 0.2

query bday: c_day = 260;
query bday: c_day = 261;
query spec: c_year = 2011;

The number in parens is the policy check, for example, the first check
(for both variables) fails for the first query, so the second check is
not done. It also fails for the second and third queries. At maximum
there are 6 policy checks, 2 after each query.

ex/pol_bday.prob (1) 1 1/1 1.000000 6.92736911773682
ex/pol_bday.prob (2) 1 1/1 1.000000 6.92736911773682
ex/pol_bday.prob (3) 1 1/1 1.000000 6.92736911773682
ex/pol_bday.prob (1) 2 1/259 0.003861 9.65216207504272
ex/pol_bday.prob (2) 2 1/7 0.142857 9.65216207504272
ex/pol_bday.prob (3) 2 1/1 1.000000 9.65216207504272
ex/pol_bday.prob (4) 2 1/1 1.000000 9.65216207504272
ex/pol_bday.prob (1) 3 1/259 0.003861 16.2377200126648
ex/pol_bday.prob (2) 3 1/7 0.142857 16.2377200126648
ex/pol_bday.prob (3) 3 1/37 0.027027 16.2377200126648
ex/pol_bday.prob (4) 3 1/1 1.000000 16.2377200126648
ex/pol_bday.prob (5) 3 11/26134 0.000421 16.2377200126648
ex/pol_bday.prob (6) 3 353/26134 0.013507 16.2377200126648
